archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.2.3b: b) restrict the system capabilities that can be accessed (e.g. by providing menus that enable access only to the particular capabilities needed to fulfil a defined role)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
